oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Citizen Listens and Learns
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Radio script prepared by Highlander Folk School, for WNOE New Orleans ahead of a three-day workshop hosted by Highlander. The program was designed to educate workers on the benefits of unionizing while dispelling counterarguments against.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Congress of Industrial Organizations (U.S.); Radio; Radio programs; Labor-management committees; Strikes and lockouts
